itunes:title: Amen & Amen Week 2 with Katherine Wolf
title: Amen & Amen Week 2 with Katherine Wolf
description:
For week 2 of Amen & Amen: A Journey Through the Psalms, Amanda and Raechel are joined by communicator, advocate, and author Katherine Wolf. Through discussing this week's psalms and as Katherine shares aspects of her own story, the three women hold in tension the range of emotions we all experience as people living in a broken world. Join us as we echo the joy and the lament of these psalms, testifying to the truth of who God is at every part of our journey. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Amen & Amen reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Title collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/amen-amen-week-2-with-katherine-wolf
